preventionbtp.name: OPPBTP: PreventionBTP v3
preventionbtp.description: Complete redesign (v3) of the official preventionbtp.fr website - Enterprise web application for prevention and safety in the French construction sector.
preventionbtp.overview: PreventionBTP is the official digital platform of OPPBTP (Professional Organization for Prevention in Construction). This v3 redesign represents a complete modernization of the architecture and user experience, serving thousands of construction professionals in France.

frontend.title: Frontend
items: React Router 7 (formerly Remix) - Full-stack framework with SSR
React 18 with Suspense and Concurrent Features
Tailwind CSS + Framer Motion for animations
Swiper for carousels, Highcharts for data viz

backend.title: Backend & API
items: Legacy Paddix API integration for business content

cms.title: CMS & Content
items: Live Preview mode for real-time editing

search.title: Advanced Search
search.description: Algolia with full-text search, dynamic facets, real-time suggestions and AI search via Perplexity

auth.title: SSO Authentication
auth.description: Complete OpenID Connect flow with role-based access control (FULL_ACCESS, READER, REFUSED) and company permissions

forms.title: Interactive Forms
forms.description: Registration, training requests, resource orders, prevention quizzes - Zod + react-hook-form + reCAPTCHA validation

sections.title: Business Sections
sections.description: Training (initial/continuing), Resources (memos, guides), News, Prevention Law, Statistics Observatory, E-learning, Webinars

seo.title: SEO & Performance
seo.description: Complete SSR, XML sitemap generation, Bing IndexNow for instant indexing, image optimization, bot detection

analytics.title: Analytics & Monitoring
analytics.description: GTM, Matomo, Hotjar (heatmaps), Zendesk (support), Didomi (cookie consent), service health checks

challenges: Migration from legacy architecture while maintaining compatibility with existing Paddix API
Managing 100+ routes with SSR and performance optimization
Content synchronization between 3 environments with custom deployment scripts
Implementation of dynamic Contentful component system (71 components)

avc.name: Au Vieux Campeur - Mobile App v2
avc.description: Cross-platform e-commerce mobile application for the outdoor equipment store chain Au Vieux Campeur. Partial design redesign of the existing app.
avc.overview: VieuxCampeur is a cross-platform e-commerce mobile application (iOS/Android) developed for the outdoor equipment store chain 'Au Vieux Campeur'. Version 2.1.7 with partial design redesign, the app offers a complete shopping experience with product scanner, store locator and loyalty program.

framework.title: Framework & Navigation
items: React Navigation with tabs and nested navigation

ui.title: UI & Animations
items: React Native Reanimated for advanced animations
Expo Vector Icons + React Native SVG

auth.title: Multi-step Authentication
auth.description: Login/signup, password reset, persistent session, anonymous user support, complete profile

search.title: Search & Discovery
search.description: Salesforce full-text search, brand/category navigation, advanced filters (price, attributes, facets), sorting and pagination

shopping.title: Shopping & Cart
shopping.description: Cart management with backend sync, wishlist, product details with variants, real-time stock verification

orders.title: Order Management
orders.description: Paginated history, real-time delivery tracking, returns management, PDF invoice download, reorder function

scanner.title: Scanner & Stores
scanner.description: QR/barcode scanner with camera and flashlight, store locator with Google Maps and geolocation

loyalty.title: Loyalty & Notifications
loyalty.description: Club loyalty card, coupons, product alerts, Firebase push notifications with automatic token management

challenges: Integration of multiple APIs (Magento, Salesforce, CouchDB, Firebase) with consistent error handling
Dual token authentication system with optimized caching to reduce API calls
Partial design redesign while maintaining compatibility with existing features
Performance optimization with Hermes and new React Native architecture

cordiste.name: OPPBTP: Best Practices Cordiste
cordiste.description: Web platform for sharing and managing best practices for the rope access profession in the construction sector. Content-driven architecture with Contentful.
cordiste.overview: Modern web platform for sharing and managing best practices for the rope access profession in the construction sector. Developed for OPPBTP, this application allows professionals to create, share and consult best practice sheets with an extensible multi-profession system.

framework.title: Framework & Rendering
items: Vite 5.4 as build tool and dev server

cms.title: CMS & Content
items: Contentful as headless CMS and database
Rich text renderer for enriched content

forms.title: Forms & Validation

creation.title: 4-Step Sheet Creation

discovery.title: Discovery & Search
discovery.description: Search with debounce, multi-selection filters (location, factors, solution types, professions), pagination and date sorting

multiProfession.title: Multi-Profession System
multiProfession.description: Profession-specific routes (/:base/sheets), metadata from Contentful, dedicated context provider for extensibility

authEnterprise.title: Enterprise-Grade Auth
authEnterprise.description: OpenID Connect, JWT management, cookie sessions, role system (FULL_ACCESS, READER, REFUSED), complete user profile

responsive.title: Advanced Responsive Design
responsive.description: Client-side viewport context, server-side client hints, 7 custom breakpoints (xs to 2xl), mobile optimizations

challenges: Content-driven architecture without separate database (Contentful as single source)
Multi-step creation workflow with file upload, image cropping and complex validation
Extensible multi-profession system with dynamic routes and dedicated contexts
Hybrid responsive detection (client context + server client hints)

gocrisis.name: GoCrisis - Crisis Management
gocrisis.description: Mobile crisis management application enabling companies to assess, manage and coordinate their responses to crisis situations.
gocrisis.overview: GoCrisis is a professional enterprise crisis management mobile application (v3.1.7). It enables teams to assess crisis situations through intelligent questionnaire system, coordinate responses with role-based team management, and trigger appropriate protocols based on severity level.

ui.title: UI & Navigation
items: 11 screens with Login (614 lines) being the most complex

backend.title: Backend & API
items: Parse Server as Backend as a Service

assessment.title: Crisis Assessment
assessment.description: 3 situation types (REAL, SIMULATION, TEST), assessment creation and completion, statuses ACTIVE/IN_PREPARATION/NOT_REACHED/NOT_ACTIVATED

questionnaire.title: Intelligent Questionnaire
questionnaire.description: JSON-based questions with branching logic, themes (Human life, Legal...), scoring mechanism, conditional navigation

scenarios.title: Scenario Management
scenarios.description: Crisis type selection (ECL), creation with parameters, Training/Simulation/Real modes, company customization

authSecure.title: Secure Authentication
authSecure.description: Domain/user/password login, auto-login, password reset, blacklist verification

notifications.title: Multi-Channel Notifications
notifications.description: Email and SMS notifications via Parse Cloud, role-based templates, receipt confirmation, notified tracking

challenges: Dynamic questionnaire system with branching logic and complex scoring
Management of 3 crisis modes (Training/Simulation/Real) with distinct workflows
Real-time team coordination with hierarchical roles (LEADER/MANAGER)
Migration to Hermes and Fabric for iOS/Android performance optimization

catalina.name: Catalina - Gamified Retail Loyalty
catalina.description: Gamified loyalty platform for retail allowing stores to offer games (casino, scratch, wheel) and rewards to their customers.
catalina.overview: Catalina is a gamified retail loyalty platform, structured as a monorepo with a Next.js 15 BFF and React frontend. It enables retail chains (Carrefour, Tigros, Aldi...) to offer loyalty games (casino, scratch, wheel) with reward system, in e-commerce or in-store mode (receipts).

monorepo.title: Monorepo & BFF
items: Proxy to external Catalina SI API

security.title: Security & Crypto
items: HMAC-SHA1 signature on every API request
Azure Key Vault for secrets (partner_k, partner_s, utf8_token)

games.title: Loyalty Games
games.description: 4 game types: Casino (roulette/dice), Scratch (scratch cards), Wheel (wheel of fortune), Flip (card flipping)

authCrypto.title: Encrypted Auth
authCrypto.description: Login via email or holder_ref with AES-ECB encryption and HMAC-SHA1 signature, secure token management

offers.title: Offer Management
offers.description: Offer retrieval by EAN code, product tagging, member shopping cart, spotlight promotional banners

instore.title: In-Store Mode
instore.description: Receipt upload and validation, QR/barcode scanner, in-store game results

multiRetailer.title: Multi-Retailers
multiRetailer.description: 8+ supported stores with custom themes, tenant-specific configs, dynamic branding

api.title: Complete API
api.description: Auth, offers, games, e-commerce/instore results, spotlight endpoints - all HMAC-signed requests

challenges: Secure BFF architecture with HMAC-SHA1 signature and AES encryption for all communications
Multi-tenant system with complete customization (themes, configs) for 8+ retail stores
Integration of e-commerce and in-store mode (receipts) in a unified experience
Extensive test coverage (~73%, 260+ files) with Vitest, Jest and MSW

elistair.name: Elistair - Drone Client Portal
elistair.description: B2B client portal for Elistair, European leader in tethered drones for defense, security and industrial applications. Fleet management and real-time monitoring.
elistair.overview: B2B client portal developed for Elistair, French company and European leader in tethered drones. The platform serves government, military and industrial clients for drone fleet management, real-time mission monitoring and secure technical documentation access.

items: Next.js 14 with App Router and Server Components
Strict TypeScript with end-to-end Zod validation
Tailwind CSS for custom design system

fleet.description: Centralized dashboard to view and manage all tethered drones, operational status, preventive maintenance and history

monitoring.description: Live mission tracking with telemetry, automatic alerts, mapping and flight replay

docs.title: Secure Documentation
docs.description: Controlled access to technical manuals, maintenance procedures, certificates and regulatory documents

users.title: User Management
users.description: Multi-tenant administration with custom roles, enterprise SSO and complete audit trail

analytics.title: Reports & Analytics
analytics.description: Mission report generation, usage statistics, fleet performance KPIs

support.title: Support & Tickets
support.description: Integrated ticketing system, knowledge base, support chat and service request tracking

challenges: Compliance with security requirements for defense and government clients
Multi-tenant architecture with strict client data isolation
Real-time integration with drone telemetry systems
Critical performance and availability for surveillance applications

timtle.name: Timtle - Real Estate Rental
timtle.description: React Native mobile application for digitalizing the rental journey, simplifying candidate file management and visit scheduling for real estate agencies.
timtle.overview: Timtle is an innovative digital solution that simplifies and digitalizes the real estate rental process. Founded in early 2023, the platform addresses pain points experienced by both property managers and tenant candidates. The application consists of two distinct mobile interfaces: one for real estate agencies and one for tenants, both designed with intuitive design and simplified user experience.

framework.title: Framework & Mobile
items: React Native for iOS and Android
Two distinct applications: Agency and Tenant
UX/UI design optimized for each audience

features.title: Business Features
items: Automatic synchronization of listings from real estate portals
Real-time tracking of each property status

documents.title: Document Management
items: Upload and validation of supporting documents

propertyManagement.title: Property Management
propertyManagement.description: Centralized tracking of all rental properties across platforms, real-time visibility into each property's rental status

candidateFiles.title: Candidate Files
candidateFiles.description: Automatic consolidation of application files per property, with all necessary supporting documents

visitScheduling.title: Visit Scheduling
visitScheduling.description: Integrated calendar system to optimize visit organization and reduce time-consuming tasks

digitalSignature.title: Electronic Signature
digitalSignature.description: Rental finalization with interest confirmation, insurance document provision and electronic lease signing

tenantApp.title: Tenant App
tenantApp.description: Dedicated interface allowing candidates to build their file, track their applications and sign their lease

agencyApp.title: Agency App
agencyApp.description: Professional interface to manage property portfolio, process applications and optimize time-to-lease

Integration with major real estate portals for automatic listing synchronization
Complete rental workflow: from application to electronic lease signing
Significant reduction in time-consuming and non-productive tasks for agencies

beager.name: Beager - Freelance Platform v2
beager.description: Complete redesign (v2) of the freelance-enterprise matching platform with automatic contractual document generation.
beager.overview: Beager is an innovative freelance-enterprise matching platform, founded in 2020. The v2 brings a complete redesign with automatic contractual document generation based on data collected during matching. Clients include: Accor, RATP, SNCF, Clarins, BlaBlaCar. The platform prioritizes quality over volume with 72h matching and guaranteed payments.

frontend.title: Frontend & Framework
items: Next.js 14 with App Router and Server Components
Tailwind CSS for responsive design system

documents.title: Document Generation
items: Dynamic templates based on matching data

matching.title: Intelligent Matching

contracts.description: Contractual documents automatically generated from matching data: contracts, amendments, NDAs, invoices

verified.title: Verified Profiles

payments.description: Secure payment system with Stripe, automatic invoicing and payment guarantee for freelancers

dashboard.description: Dedicated interface for enterprises: mission management, freelancer tracking, analytics and reporting

freelanceSpace.title: Freelance Space

Multi-criteria matching algorithm with real-time scoring
Complete Stripe integration with recurring payments and commission management
Multi-tenant architecture with client enterprise data isolation

tchee.name: Tchee - Ride-Hailing App
tchee.description: Complete ride-hailing platform (Uber-style) for the African market with passenger/driver mobile app, backend API and admin backoffice. Multi-provider payments (Stripe, Orange Money, Wave).
tchee.overview: Tchee is a complete ride-hailing application (Uber-style) designed for the African market. The platform consists of 3 distinct parts: a React Native mobile app for passengers and drivers, a Node.js backend API, and an admin backoffice. It supports card payments (Stripe), cash and Mobile Money (Orange Money, MTN, Moov, Wave).

mobile.title: Mobile App (Expo)
items: Google Maps API + Places for geolocation

backend.title: Backend API (Node.js)
items: 49 REST API routes (auth, trips, payments, documents)

payments.title: Payments & Notifications
items: Mobile Money: Orange Money, MTN, Moov, Wave
Firebase Cloud Messaging for push notifications

passenger.title: Passenger Side
passenger.description: Destination search (Google Places), route calculation, ride creation, real-time driver tracking on map, ride history and wallet

driver.title: Driver Side
driver.description: Complete onboarding (documents, vehicle, photos), active mode to receive rides, ride management, finances with earnings and commissions

payments.title: Multi-Provider Payments
payments.description: Credit card (Stripe), cash, Mobile Money (Orange Money, MTN, Moov, Wave) with confirmation webhooks

realtime.title: Real-Time Tracking
realtime.description: Live driver position on map, ride lifecycle (pending → accepted → in_progress → completed), push notifications

admin.title: Admin BackOffice
admin.description: 3-tab dashboard (rides, payments, users), driver document validation, commission settings (15%) and pricing

pricing.title: Dynamic Pricing
pricing.description: Base 500 XOF + 50 XOF/min + 100 XOF/km, 15% commission, peak hours multiplier 1.5x (7-9am, 5-7pm)

challenges: Complete 3-tier architecture: Mobile App + Backend API + BackOffice communicating via REST/JWT
Multi-payment integration adapted to African market (Mobile Money dominant)
Real-time GPS tracking with battery optimization and Google Maps route calculation
Driver document validation workflow with state management (pending → approved/rejected)

sayyes.name: SayYes - Portfolio & Landing Builder
sayyes.description: Portfolio management and dynamic landing page platform for creative agencies with advanced animations and modular CMS.
sayyes.overview: SayYes is a portfolio management and dynamic landing page platform designed for creative agencies and digital studios. The application showcases client projects with advanced animations (Framer Motion, Three.js) and enables creation of customizable landing pages via a modular block system.

landingBuilder.title: Landing Page Builder
landingBuilder.description: Modular block system: blocIntro, cards, chiffresCles, testimonial, methods, faq, useCase, footer - Visual per-block configuration

portfolios.title: Portfolio Management
portfolios.description: Full CRUD with WYSIWYG editor, drag & drop media upload, flexible Bento grid, integrated SEO (meta tags, schema.org)

animations.title: Advanced Animations

admin.title: Admin Dashboard

CSS @property polyfill for Safari iOS with JavaScript fallback for animated gradients
Robust TypeScript architecture with well-defined types for the block system
Performance optimization: SSR, code splitting, image optimization, PWA caching

guardian.name: Guardian - DeFi Smart Accounts
guardian.description: Autonomous fund manager for Monad Testnet with MetaMask Smart Accounts, reusable delegations and AI strategy recommendation agent.
guardian.overview: Guardian is an autonomous fund manager developed for the Monad x MetaMask Smart Accounts hackathon. The application combines Smart Accounts with deterministic CREATE2 deployment, reusable delegations (single signature for multiple jobs), an AI agent with multi-strategy scoring, and DCA automation. Architecture of 174 TypeScript files and 36,500+ lines of code.

blockchain.title: Blockchain & Web3
items: MetaMask Delegation Toolkit 0.13 for Smart Accounts

indexation.title: Indexation & Data
items: Persistent cache for logos and metadata

agentBrain.title: AI Agent Brain
agentBrain.description: Decision engine evaluating 4 strategies (staking, DCA, hold, compound) with 0-100 scoring based on volatility, volume, liquidity and estimated APY

delegations.title: Reusable Delegations
delegations.description: Single signature for multiple executions, CREATE2 Smart Accounts with auto-deployment, smartSession and functionCall scopes

scheduler.title: DCA Scheduler
scheduler.description: In-memory scheduler for automatic Dollar Cost Averaging, disk persistence, auto-stop on expiration, real-time tracking

tokenDiscovery.title: Token Discovery
tokenDiscovery.description: Autonomous pipeline: Envio HyperSync → Scan Swap events → DB → CoinMarketCap enrichment, 0-4 stars confidence score

smartHarvest.title: Smart Harvest
smartHarvest.description: Main workflow: market evaluation → AI recommendation → delegation submission → automated DCA job

authSiwe.title: SIWE Auth
authSiwe.description: Sign-In With Ethereum: wallet connection, server nonce, signature verification, secure session cookie

challenges: Smart Accounts with deterministic CREATE2 deployment and first transaction = deployment + atomic execution
Reusable delegations eliminating re-signature friction for recurring DCA jobs
Envio integration with 50x optimization via batching and intelligent filtering (99% event reduction)
AI agent with explicit reasoning and confidence level for each recommendation

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Selected Works
portfolio.heading: My Projects
portfolio.description: A curated showcase of innovative digital experiences, from luxury e-commerce platforms to real-time analytics dashboards and cutting-edge mobile applications.

cta.title: Have a project in mind?
cta.description: Let's discuss how I can help bring your ideas to life with modern, performant solutions.

sayyes.title: SayYes
sayyes.description: Full-stack portfolio/agency web application with custom CMS, modular landing page builder, and complete back-office.
sayyes.longDescription: SayYes is a full-stack portfolio/agency website with a custom content management system (CMS). It allows presenting client projects through a dynamic gallery with category filtering, scroll animations, and rich detail views. The application includes a modular landing page builder with 7 different block types, a complete admin back-office with secure authentication, and an on-the-fly image optimization system with dual-layer caching.
features: Design provided by client (digital communication agency)
Dynamic portfolio gallery with real-time filtering
Landing page builder with 7 modular blocks
Configurable Bento grid with 6 different formats

design.title: Client Design
design.content: The design was provided by SayYes Agency, a digital communication agency. My role was to transform their creative vision into a performant and functional web application, faithfully respecting the mockups and brand identity.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
SayYes is a full-stack web application for presenting client projects and creating custom marketing landing pages. Built with Remix and React, it delivers a smooth user experience through Framer Motion animations and Lenis smooth scrolling.

The modern architecture combines TypeScript for code robustness, Prisma ORM for data management, and an optimized caching system for maximum performance.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Gallery
portfolio.content: The portfolio gallery features a responsive grid display (2-4 columns) with real-time category filtering. Each project has a detailed view including a hero image with parallax effect, client testimonial, deliverables list, Bento grid for photos, and a carousel of similar projects.

landingBuilder.title: Landing Page Builder
landingBuilder.content: The modular block system allows creating custom landing pages with 7 component types: blocIntro (hero), cards (products/services), chiffresCles (animated metrics), testimonial (client reviews), methods (process steps), faq (accordion), and useCase (portfolio showcase).

backoffice.title: Admin Back-Office
backoffice.content: The complete back-office offers secure session authentication, full CRUD for portfolios, image upload with preview, and a visual landing page builder. SEO management includes meta tags and Schema.org JSON-LD for optimal search engine visibility.

bentoGrid.title: Bento Grid
bentoGrid.content: The Bento grid editor allows configuring image layouts for each project with 6 different formats. The drag & drop interface makes it easy to visually organize content and create unique, engaging presentations.

performance.title: Performance Optimizations
performance.content: The dual-layer image caching system combines memory cache (1h TTL) and disk cache (7 days TTL). Responsive images are generated on demand from 20px to 1920px with automatic format detection (WebP/AVIF with JPEG fallback). Code splitting optimizes loading of heavy assets.

technical.title: Technical Architecture
technical.content: Frontend stack: Remix 2.14, React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Three.js, and Lenis for smooth scrolling. Backend: Prisma ORM with SQLite, Sharp for image optimization. DevOps: Vite with PWA support, ESLint + Prettier, Service Worker for offline caching.

architecture.title: Full-Stack Architecture
architecture.content: The architecture relies on three distinct layers: Client (React 18 with SSR/Hydration, TypeScript, Framer Motion, Three.js, Tailwind CSS), Remix 2.14 Server (Loaders/Actions, Session Auth, Sharp Image Pipeline), and Data Layer (Prisma ORM, SQLite, dual-layer cache system with Memory Cache 1h TTL and Disk Cache 7 days). This architecture ensures optimal performance (Lighthouse 95+) while maintaining excellent DX with Vite, ESLint, and Hot Module Replacement.

pulseAnalytics.title: Pulse Analytics
pulseAnalytics.description: Enterprise-grade real-time analytics platform processing millions of data points per second with stunning visualizations and actionable insights.
pulseAnalytics.longDescription: Pulse Analytics is a next-generation B2B SaaS platform that transforms raw data into actionable business intelligence. Built to handle massive data streams in real-time, the platform processes over 10,000 events per second with 99.99% uptime. Features include customizable dashboards, AI-driven anomaly detection, automated reporting, and seamless integrations with 50+ third-party services. Currently serving 120+ enterprise clients worldwide.

tchee.title: Tchee
tchee.description: Complete VTC/Taxi application for the African market with real-time GPS tracking, multi-provider payments and driver document verification.
tchee.longDescription: Tchee is a ride-hailing application (Uber/Bolt style) designed specifically for the African market. It connects passengers looking to travel with professional drivers.
features: Real-time GPS tracking of driver on map
Real-time price and trip time estimation
3 payment methods: Cash, Stripe, Mobile Money
Address search with Google Places autocomplete
Dynamic pricing with peak hour surcharges

overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
Tchee is a complete ride-hailing solution developed to meet the specific needs of the African market, and more specifically the Malian market. In Mali, most transactions are done via mobile money.

The idea of the application is to connect passengers and professional drivers through a smooth and intuitive mobile experience, allowing payment via any payment method. It is available in Mali on iOS and Android.

mobileApp.title: Mobile Application
mobileApp.content: A single application for passengers and drivers. Passengers can book a ride in seconds thanks to Google Places autocomplete. Drivers have a dedicated interface with document verification (license, insurance, criminal record). Each profile is validated by administration before activation.

tracking.title: Real-Time GPS Tracking
tracking.content: The core of the application relies on an accurate GPS tracking system. Passengers can follow their driver's arrival on the map, then track the journey to their destination. Positions are continuously updated via an architecture optimized to minimize battery consumption.

payments.title: Multi-Provider Payments
payments.content: Tchee supports 3 payment methods adapted to the African market: cash payment for unbanked users, credit card via Stripe for international payments, and Mobile Money (Orange Money) which represents the most popular payment method in the region. The system manages the complete transaction lifecycle with webhooks and automatic reconciliation.

dashboard.title: Financial Dashboard
dashboard.content: Drivers access a comprehensive financial dashboard displaying their real-time earnings, trip history, deducted commissions, and available balance. Detailed statistics allow performance analysis over different periods.

notifications.title: Push Notifications
notifications.content: The cross-platform push notification system uses Firebase Cloud Messaging for distribution and Notifee for local display. Passengers are notified at each step: driver assigned, imminent arrival, trip completed. Drivers receive new ride requests in real-time.

admin.title: Administration
admin.content: A web administration dashboard allows managing the entire platform: driver document validation, user management, rate configuration (price/km, price/minute, peak hour surcharges), trip monitoring, and driver payment processing.

cicd.title: CI/CD
cicd.content: Automated deployment pipeline via GitHub Actions. Each push triggers tests, build, and deployment to stores (iOS/Android) and production server. Staging and production environments are isolated with automatic rollback in case of error.

stores.title: App Store & Play Store
stores.content: Application published on the App Store (iOS) and Google Play Store (Android). Metadata, screenshots, and localized descriptions management. Apple and Google review process respected with OTA (Over-The-Air) updates via Expo Updates for minor fixes without going through the stores.

technical.title: Technical Architecture
technical.content: The mobile application is developed in React Native with Expo SDK 54, enabling deployment on iOS and Android from a single codebase. The backend uses React Router v7 in fullstack mode with MySQL database and Prisma ORM. Authentication relies on JWT with secure refresh tokens.

about.name: Eden Wisniewski
about.bio: Passionate about web and mobile development for over 6 years, I create custom digital solutions that combine performance, design and user experience.
about.experience: From innovative startups to large-scale e-commerce projects, I support my clients from design to production. My expertise covers frontend, backend, mobile and DevOps.
